column5: Hi all,  The ice has all but cleared from the front of the house. On sunday/monday/tuesday we have high winds and rain forecast...that will be the end of it.  The weather has been great here the last 2 days and evenings have been spent with Jack and mum casting from shore, love the early ice out....NO BUGS BITING!  I have been setting up ice out pike rigs with a great big sucker minnow while Jack has been casting his combo rod with a jig and minnow. Jack beat me to it this year landing the first fish from our shore...a respectable 27" pike!  He was reeling in and said to mum...."its stuck on something...i need help", mum grabs the rod to realise right away its not stuck but has a fish on! Mum reeled it in but Jack's superior jigging triggered the bite! WTG SON!  Roloff is slowly getting braver and venturing deeper into the water...but the water would still be a bit cold on the ole nutsack so i dont blame him for not fully taking the plunge yet!   Anyhoo....here is a pic of Jack';s Jack and some iceout/Roloff/random yardfishing pics from yesterday and this evening.   WTG JACK!
WTG lil Jack! Nice Pike and some great pics!!  Cheers
nice pics, you're lucky to live where you do, the GTA sucks nice fish Jack
Nice pix, thanx for sharing.  I thought U guys ice fished till July?  LOL
Cool you can even ride to your fishing spot. Lol at the lawnmower shot.
Isn't it great Simon? Having your little man fishin side by side with you, watchin him grow.
Great pics, why isn't jack on this forum yet, he seems to know what he's doing?!
Awesome report Simon. Love seeing Jack out there fishing and pulling in nice ones at that.
Awesome great to see spring is starting for you guys way in da north.
Great stuff right there!!! Way to go Jack.

Thanks for all the replies guys.   We used to...lol. But i'm not minding these 3 month winters with only 2 days at -30C....works for me!    LOL...i had to snap a shot of them...they were riding around everywhere all day...too funny.    YUP...THE BEST!    As soon as he can type i'm sure he'll enjoy it on here. He already likes sitting with me looking at the pictures people post.
One of the luckiest kids in the world...  And glad he shares your passion... I hope I'm that lucky with Connor....
That's awesome Simon    Congrats to little Jack
